title: H.E. Mohammad bin Abdullah Al Gergawi

quotes: In 2006, His Excellency Mohammad Abdullah Al Gergawi was appointed Minister of Cabinet Affairs of the UAE Government, in addition to his capacity as Deputy Chairman of the Ministerial ‎Development Council (MDC).

Between February 2016 and July 2020, Future Foresight was added to Al Gergawi’s ministerial portfolio, where he was mandated to develop the UAE’s Future Foresight Strategy aiming to promote government readiness for the future.

As the founding Chairman of the World Government Summit, His Excellency has overseen the summit since its inception in 2013, transforming it into the world's largest annual government gathering, bringing together government thought leaders, major corporate executives, future designers, and international organizations.

organizations.name: UAE Government
quotes: In 2006, His Excellency Mohammad Abdullah Al Gergawi was appointed Minister of Cabinet Affairs of the UAE Government, in addition to his capacity as Deputy Chairman of the Ministerial ‎Development Council (MDC).

organizations.name: Ministerial ‎Development Council (MDC)
quotes: In 2006, His Excellency Mohammad Abdullah Al Gergawi was appointed Minister of Cabinet Affairs of the UAE Government, in addition to his capacity as Deputy Chairman of the Ministerial ‎Development Council (MDC).

organizations.name: Executive Office of Dubai
quotes: In addition to his ministerial duties, His Excellency holds several leading positions, including: ‎Chairman of the Executive Office of Dubai; Chairman of the World Governments Summit (WGS); Vice Chairman of the Board of Trustees and Managing Director of the Dubai Future Foundation (DFF); Secretary General of the Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum Global Initiatives (MBRGI); Chairman of the Museum of the Future and Chairman of the Board of Trustees of Great Arab Minds.

In 2006, His Excellency Mohammad Abdullah Al Gergawi was appointed Minister of Cabinet Affairs of the UAE Government, in addition to his capacity as Deputy Chairman of the Ministerial ‎Development Council (MDC).

In addition to his ministerial duties, His Excellency holds several leading positions, including: ‎Chairman of the Executive Office of Dubai; Chairman of the World Governments Summit (WGS); Vice Chairman of the Board of Trustees and Managing Director of the Dubai Future Foundation (DFF); Secretary General of the Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum Global Initiatives (MBRGI); Chairman of the Museum of the Future and Chairman of the Board of Trustees of Great Arab Minds.

supporting_quotes: In 2006, His Excellency Mohammad Abdullah Al Gergawi was appointed Minister of Cabinet Affairs of the UAE Government, in addition to his capacity as Deputy Chairman of the Ministerial ‎Development Council (MDC).

supporting_quotes: As the founding Chairman of the World Government Summit, His Excellency has overseen the summit since its inception in 2013, transforming it into the world's largest annual government gathering, bringing together government thought leaders, major corporate executives, future designers, and international organizations.
assembled_events.notes: Founding Chairman role with ongoing oversight since 2013.

supporting_quotes: Between February 2016 and July 2020, Future Foresight was added to Al Gergawi’s ministerial portfolio, where he was mandated to develop the UAE’s Future Foresight Strategy aiming to promote government readiness for the future.
assembled_events.notes: Additional responsibility added to existing ministerial role.

supporting_quotes: In addition to his ministerial duties, His Excellency holds several leading positions, including: ‎Chairman of the Executive Office of Dubai; Chairman of the World Governments Summit (WGS); Vice Chairman of the Board of Trustees and Managing Director of the Dubai Future Foundation (DFF); Secretary General of the Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum Global Initiatives (MBRGI); Chairman of the Museum of the Future and Chairman of the Board of Trustees of Great Arab Minds.

Missing time markers for multiple leadership roles, making it difficult to establish temporal coherence.
